title: OhMyFood
description: Mobile-first website listing gourmet restaurant menus with CSS animations.

title: Kasa
description: Front-end redesign of Kasa with React (Vite): SPA using React Router, reusable components, and responsive Figma integration. Local JSON data while waiting for the API.

title: Sophie Bluel
description: Building a dynamic web page for interior designer Sophie Bluel using JavaScript and a provided API: fetching projects and filtering by category, an admin login page with token-based authentication (token persisted in sessionStorage across reloads and reset when returning to the login page), and an accessible modal to upload new media with validation/preview and project deletion. Front-end built from the provided HTML/Figma mockups: DOM manipulation and event handling, asynchronous fetch requests, error handling, and forms (error message under the password field).

title: Argent Bank
description: Banking web app front end built with React and Redux Toolkit: secure authentication (login/logout, error handling), a responsive user dashboard with nickname editing, and a consistent global state. Integrated with the back end through documented REST APIs. Green-code mindset with optimized images and reusable components. Designed transaction routes and delivered a Swagger specification in YAML.

title: Nina Carducci
description: SEO optimization: audit with Lighthouse, fixes for performance and accessibility, semantic HTML cleanup, lighter images (webp, proper sizes, lazy loading), and complete metadata for search and social (Open Graph/Twitter). Added local SEO using Schema.org and delivered a documented before/after report.

title: Anastasia R.
description: Personal portfolio built with React (Vite) and SASS: animated home (medallion), egg-style project cards, petal filters, a Skills page connected to projects, i18n (FR/RU/EN), accessibility best practices and solid Lighthouse performance. Contact form with validation (react-hook-form) and smooth UX.
